name: PrayerTime
0:
”Alexa, Open Prayer Time”
”Alexa, Ask Prayer Time, When is Fajr?”
”Alexa, Ask Prayer Time, When is the next Prayer?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: prayer time
des:
Assalamualikum,

Prayer Time provides a simple, easy to use skill to retrieve prayer times.

Provides the following functionality:

- Prayer times for specific salah/prayer/namaz by name
- The next prayer time and the amount of time remaining until it is due

**Note**
This skill requires postal code and country location details to determine the exact timings.

The calculation method is ISNA.

Some examples:

Alexa, Ask Prayer Time, when is Magrib?
Alexa, Ask Prayer Time, when is prayer?
Alexa, Ask Prayer Time, when is sunrise?
Alexa, Ask Prayer Time, what time is sunset?
Alexa, Ask Prayer Time, what time is Fajr?
Alexa, Ask Prayer Time, what time is salah?
